name: Dreadful Dice
description:
Your goal is to defeat the shadow at the end of the dungeon.

Collect symbols from the dungeon. Make it out alive, and use your loot to edit the symbols on your dice. Some symbols give bonus effects when rolled. If you die in the dungeon you lose what you collected.

WASD to move; Left click and draw a circle around yourself, an enemy, or loot chest, to cast dice.  You can cast up to 3 dice at once. Match the symbols on the dice to the indicators above enemies to defeat them. Choose your battles carefully; casting dice agitates the dungeon. If the counter in the top right reaches 0, the dungeon will claim you.

Good luck!

This is a prototype made in 72 hours for Mini-Jam 83: Dread, with the added limitation that dice had to be a core mechanic.
